name: daskeyboard-applet--dasping
description: Display ping values as a color gradient on a key.
longDescription: Periodically pings a website and assigns a color to a key based on the response time.

questions.label: Polling Interval (milliseconds)
questions.help: How frequently to ping the address in milliseconds. 1000 would be one second, 60000 would be one minute. [Default: 60000]

questions.label: Ping Threshold (milliseconds)
questions.help: All ping times below this number will be considered green. Every step above will change colors. [Default: 300]

questions.label: Mid Points / Steps
questions.help: Number of steps between the threshold and slowest value. 3 mid steps (set here) results in 5 possible key colors: threshold, 3 midsteps, last step. [Default: 3]

questions.label: Time Between Steps (milliseconds)
questions.help: The time/distance between steps in milliseconds. [Default: 100]

questions.label: Good Ping Color
questions.help: This color will be used for pings at or lower than the threshold. Times above will be a gradient between this and the Bad Ping Color.

questions.label: Bad Ping Color
questions.help: This color will be used for all pings higher than the last step. Times below will be a gradient between this and the Good Ping Color.

questions.label: Failure Ping Color
questions.help: This color will be used for any pings that fail to bring back a time.
